Package com.nrifintech.cms.controllers

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.controllers.InventoryController
@RequestMapping("/inventory/") @RestController public class InventoryController extends Object
> This class is a controller that handles requests to the `/inventory` route

      @PostMapping("save/one") public Response saveOne​(@RequestBody InventoryDto inventoryDto)
      > This function takes a JSON object, converts it to a Java object, saves it to the database, and returns the saved object
      Parameters:
      inventoryDto - This is the object that will be sent to the server.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • saveAll

      @PostMapping("save/all") public Response saveAll​(@RequestBody List<Inventory> inventory)
      It saves all the inventory items in the database.
      Parameters:
      inventory - This is the list of inventory objects that we want to save.
      Returns:
      A Response object with the inventory list and a status of OK.

      > This function gets an inventory by id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the inventory you want to get.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

      @GetMapping("get/name/{name}") public Response getByName​(@PathVariable String name)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A list of inventory objects

      @GetMapping("remove/{id}") public Response delete​(@PathVariable int id)
      > This function deletes an inventory item by its id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the inventory to be deleted
      Returns:
      A Response object is being returned.

    • updateQtyInHand

      @GetMapping("update/qtyhand/{id}/{qtyhand}") public Response updateQtyInHand​(@PathVariable int id, @PathVariable double qtyhand)
      It updates the quantity in hand of a particular inventory item
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the inventory item
      qtyhand - the quantity that is being sold
      Returns:
      Response is a class that I have created.

    • updateQtyRequested

      @GetMapping("update/qtyreq/{id}/{qtyreq}") public Response updateQtyRequested​(@PathVariable int id, @PathVariable double qtyreq)
      It updates the quantity requested of an inventory item and sends an email to all admin users
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the inventory item
      qtyreq - the quantity requested
      Returns:
      A Response object.
